text: 2000 (two thousand) is a natural number after 1999 and before 2001. It also appears in the calendar year. It is: :*the highest number expressible using only two unmodified characters in Roman numerals (MM) In Roman Numerals, 2000 is written as MM. ==Factors== The factors of 2000 are: 1, 2, 4, 5, 8, 10, 16, 20, 25, 40, 50, 80, 100, 125, 200, 250, 400, 500, 1000 and 2000. ==Multiples== Here are the first 12 multiples of 2000: 2000 x 1 = 2000 2000 x 2 = 4000 2000 x 3 = 6000 2000 x 4 = 8000 2000 x 5 = 10000 2000 x 6 = 12000 2000 x 7 = 14000 2000 x 8 = 16000 2000 x 9 = 18000 2000 x 10 = 20000 2000 x 11 = 22000 2000 x 12 = 24000 2000 x 13 = 26000 2000 x 14 = 28000 2000 x 15 = 30000 2000 x 16 = 32000 2000 x 17 = 34000 Category:Integers
title: 2000 (number)
